text: is a Japanese actress who is affiliated with Horipro. ==Biography== In 2001, Kinami was chosen as Japanese High School Baseball Championship PR schoolgirl during high school. In the same year, she won the Grand Prix at the Horipro New Star Audition. In 2002, while planning to appear in the variety series, Hiroyuki Yabe no Offer shi Chaimashita, Kinami was asked by Hiroyuki Yabe to appear in a commercial. In addition, she was elected in the female idol unit, TV Asahi Angel Eye 2002. From 2002 to 2003, Kinami appeared in the idol unit Licca. From 2004 to 2005, she appeared in the variety series, Fuko no Hosoku, it was known that she played Sachiko in a reproducible drama is widely known. In 2008, Kinami graduated from Faculty of Letters of Kokugakuin University. In 2009, she played as Kyoko Koizumi in the film, 20th Century Boys, and was also evaluated in supervision and authorship. (2008年9月3日 MSN産経ニュース、ウェブアーカイブ) In 2013, Kinami's first main role in a film was Hyaku-nen no Tokei (directed by Shusuke Kaneko) as Ryo Kandaka. ==Personal life== Kinami attended Korean school for a year as a hobby and is able to speak basic Korean. ==Filmography== ===TV series=== {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%;" |- bgcolor="#B0C4DE" align="center" !
